title: Hard to understand lifetime error when return value and argument do not align

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: NLL-fixed-by-NLL
labels.description: Bugs fixed, but only when NLL is enabled.

labels.name: D-confusing
labels.description: Confusing diagnostic error that should be reworked

body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->

I tried this code:

```rust
use std::borrow::Cow;

struct Script<'script> {
    name: Cow<'script, str>
}

impl<'script> Script<'script> {
  fn run<'run, 'event>(
    &'run self,
    args: &'run[&'run Cow<'event, str>]
  ) -> Cow<'event, str> where 'script: 'event, 'event: 'run {
      self.run1(args)
  }
  
  fn run1<'run, 'event>(
    &'script self,
    _args: &'run[&'run Cow<'event, str>]
  ) -> Cow<'event, str> where 'script: 'event, 'event: 'run {
      self.name.clone()
  }
}

fn main() {
    println!("Hello, world!");
}
```

I expected to see this happen:

An error pointing to a bad lifetime around the return value of the function.

Instead, this happened:

An error pointing to `args` that isn't involved in the error.

```
   Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground)
error[E0623]: lifetime mismatch
  --> src/main.rs:13:7
   |
10 |     &'run self,
   |     ---------- these two types are declared with different lifetimes...
11 |     args: &'run[&'run Cow<'event, str>]
   |                       ----------------
12 |   ) -> Cow<'event, str> where 'script: 'event, 'event: 'run {
13 |       self.run1(args)
   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ...but data from `self` flows into `args` here
```

### Meta
`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.42.0 (b8cedc004 2020-03-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: b8cedc00407a4c56a3bda1ed605c6fc166655447
commit-date: 2020-03-09
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.42.0
LLVM version: 9.0
```

runnambe example https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=1ea701eca44f1cdc41a27073d1b7665c
